cause.description:
Bikes and Trikes for Tykes is a 100% volunteer not-for-profit organization which; receives bicycle donations from the general public, cleans and repairs the bicycles, and gives them to kids around the Kansas City Area by working through other charitable organizations. In 1993, Bikes and Trikes for Tykes became chartered as a not-for-profit organization in the State of Missouri, and continue to operate with a 12 member board that governs its actions.
ATTENTION:We regret to inform you that Bikes and Trikes for Trikes was unable to find a suitable new home and we are liquidating all bikes and parts. We would like to thank Kansas City for it's support.
